feed.title: Wiki-Go Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.3.19
entry.content:
• Fixes anchor picker last item being clipped and stops it from changing size (7f4fbfd by Amin Persia)
  • Adds the missing styles for hyperlinks in document history preview (bf756ba by Amin Persia)
  • Fixes move/rename button visibility (1919dc6 by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.4.0
entry.content:
• Minor logging cleanup (f2799ab by Amin Persia)
  • Bugfix - fixes moving to root not working Documents with category now can move to root (65acfac by Amin Persia)
  • Adds moving of comments when document is moved/renamed (8f90020 by Amin Persia)
  • Cleans up all json api endpoints to be more consistent (93cc457 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds missing translations using ChatGPT (23faf2b by Amin Persia)
  • Adds import feature as zip file Import zip package must have folder structure and only md files. (a71db6b by Amin Persia)
  • Improves document handling in editor.go (3ee2b49 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds rest api examples (7586621 by Amin Persia)
  • Changes from admin/viewer to user roles: admin/editor/viewer with migration script (e62ac90 by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.4.1
entry.content:
• Fixes migrate not letting config.yaml creation for new setups (d31ff3c by Amin Persia)
  • Adds preview reset for version history dialog (7450bd5 by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.4.2
entry.content:
• Adds live checkbox editing when logged in as admin or editor #24 (bc22ea5 by Amin Persia)
  • Disables custom TaskListPreprocessor to use the built-in one (9b97edc by Amin Persia)
  • Adds auto link embedding from clipboard #12 (87a816a by Amin Persia)
  • Adds image upload from clipboard #15 (e87d8a8 by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.4.3
entry.content:
• Adds custom.css for user customization (47bd1f5 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds webp file attachment support (734afc8 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds better slug generation using gosimple/slug (7495810 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds folder nesting indicator (c004397 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds auth for api endpoints when wiki is set to privatge - ServeFileHandler - ListFilesHandler - GetCommentsHandler (ad8b04f by Amin Persia)
  • Subscript processor bugfix (3acf9ea by Amin Persia)
  • Updates all modules and vendor (0c1f9d1 by Amin Persia)
  • Refactors editor.js - lots of cleanup - moves cm styles to css files (3e6ddc0 by Amin Persia)
